Generation IX.Scarlet: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.
Generation IX.Violet: The steel section is Varoom's actual body. This Pokémon clings to rocks and converts the minerals within into energy to fuel its activities.

Generation IX.Scarlet: East Province: Area Three West Province: Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
Generation IX.Violet: East Province: Area Three West Province: Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 2★ )
